attributes.action: ban tax on tobacco products in fairness of being discriminated against for smoking.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: why should we the brittish public who pay tax on nearly everything we have apart form the air we breathe pay tax on cigarettes or tobacco when the government is allowing themselves to dicriminate (us the public) for smoking, forcing us outside of workplaces pubs etc, thats like us passing a law to stop all government officials driving on motorways due to having high emission vehicles eg. jaguars i-e mr prescott, thankyou for your support, fairness and equal rights for smokers!
